definition[0]: when something is kept in its original state or in good condition
example[1]: Eliot campaigned for the preservation of Londonâ€™s churches.
example[2]: We are working for the preservation of the environment.
example[3]: the preservation of our cultural heritage
definition[1]: the act of making sure that a situation continues without changing
example[4]: the preservation of peace in the region
definition[2]: the degree to which something has remained unchanged or unharmed by weather, age etc
example[5]: The arena is in an exceptionally fine state of preservation.
